GameConditionDef.label: pale scourge
GameConditionDef.description: The area is suffering the effects of a troll outbreak.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a troll outbreak has been detected in the region surrounding [map_definite], potentially causing dangerous trolls to build burrows or wander in.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Growls can be heard from within the dark tunnels serpenting beneath the cold earth. A second winter struck, as countless ravenous trolls tear through the land and emerge to the surface in search of food.\n\nThis can last between days to several weeks.
